item.description:
Hey all,

Let's do a run through Boston to see the holiday lights. This is a run we did last year, and it was a lot of fun. We'll start in front of the Barnes and Noble in Kenmore Square and head down Comm Ave, through the Boston Public Garden and Boston Common, to Fanueil Hall and Quincy Market, and then back to Kenmore Square.  The course will be lit up for the holidays. Post run food/bevvies at a Kenmore Square establishment, such as Cornwall's or the Boston Beer Works.  About 9:30-10 min./mile pace. See you there!

http://classic.mapmyrun.com/run/united-states/ma/boston/250132363690334669
item.name: Holiday Lights Run - Boston, MA
